scripts.lint: yarn APP_DESK run lint && yarn APP_E2E run lint && yarn workspace eslint-config-people run lint && yarn I18N run lint
scripts.lint-fix: yarn APP_DESK run lint --fix && yarn APP_E2E run lint --fix && yarn workspace eslint-config-people run lint --fix && yarn I18N run lint --fix
scripts.i18n:deploy: yarn I18N run format-deploy && yarn APP_DESK prettier
